h3_title: Poison Chief Fights and Boss Guides
content: Its charges can be avoided, by dashing out of the way just before it reaches you. A similar approach can be applied to dealing with its lunges and punches.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Poison_Chiefs.md', within the main section titled 'Poison Chiefs', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection 'Poison Chief Fights and Boss Guides'.
The content is as follows:
Its charges can be avoided, by dashing out of the way just before it reaches you. A similar approach can be applied to dealing with its lunges and punches.
